description:
Used To Get all Articles list with it's Main Info, if category was Provied , so the List will Be Spicified for this Category, Else, it return All Articles Sorted By the Publish Date.
in the Response there is 'views' which is the Count of how meny time this article was open or views (by logged-in users or un-registerd Users, and 'seenCount' which is the Count of only signed users That See this Article
